meanings.definition: A device that continuously records atmospheric pressure.
meanings.sent1: The barographs in the weather station help track changes in air pressure.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use barographs to monitor the atmospheric pressure over time.
meanings.sent3: The barographs at the meteorology lab never get tired of jotting down pressure readings.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a barographs, always recording every little detail around her.
meanings.sent5: The barographs hummed softly as they diligently kept a record of the changing pressure.
